Heat 1 1/2 teaspoons butter in a pressure cooker, add 1 bay leaf, 30 grams carrots and mix it well.

 Add 500 grams tomato and mix it well.

 Cook for 5 - 7 minutes on medium heat.

 Add 1/2 teaspoon salt, 500 millilites water and mix it again.

 Cover it with lid and cook until you hear 2 whistles.

 Open the lid and remove it from heat.

 Allow it to cool for about 10 minutes.

 Transfer this into a blender and blend it into a paste.

 Transfer this puree into a pot and stir well.

 Then, add 1 tablespoon powdered sugar, 1/2 teaspoon black pepper, 1/4 teaspoon roasted cumin powder, 1/4 teaspoon salt and mix it well.

 Bring it to a boil.

 Boil for 8 - 10 minutes on medium heat.

 Remove it from heat.

 Serve hot.
